intra_panel_references.logic_excerpt: IF India is selected in previous field then Values is DOM IN, If international is selected then value is INT
intra_panel_references.dependency_description: Process Type value is derived based on the selection in 'Select the process type' field

intra_panel_references.logic_excerpt: Dropdown values will come based on the account group/vendor type selection field
intra_panel_references.dependency_description: Dropdown options for Group key/Corporate Group are filtered based on Account Group/Vendor Type selection

intra_panel_references.logic_excerpt: If account group/vendor type is selected as ZDES, ZDOM, ZRPV, ZONE (any one) then derived it as Domestic. If Account group/vendor type is selected as ZIMP, ZSTV, ZDAS (any one) then derived it as import
intra_panel_references.dependency_description: Vendor Domestic or Import value is derived based on the Account Group/Vendor Type selection

intra_panel_references.logic_excerpt: If the Select the process type field value is India then country is India and Noneditable, If Select the process type field value is international then country is selectable dropdown
intra_panel_references.dependency_description: Country field behavior (editable vs non-editable, fixed value vs dropdown) depends on Select the process type field

intra_panel_references.logic_excerpt: If Country code is selected then derive the country name as column 5 on table 1.1

intra_panel_references.logic_excerpt: If Country code is selected then derive the country name as column 2 on table 1.1
intra_panel_references.dependency_description: Country Code is derived from the Country field selection

intra_panel_references.logic_excerpt: Dropdown values will come from column 3 based on process type filter (DOM IN or INT) as column 1 of reference table 1.2
intra_panel_references.dependency_description: Company Code dropdown options are filtered based on Process Type value (DOM IN or INT)

depends_on.effect: Field becomes visible and mandatory when Cancelled Cheque option is selected

intra_panel_references.source_logic: If process type is India and Please choose the option is choose as Cancelled Cheque then it is visible and mandatory. The upload limit should be up to 15 Mb. Perform the Bank OCR and get IFSC code and Account Number

depends_on.condition: Please choose the option == 'Passbook Front Page (India Domestic and International)'
condition_values: Passbook Front Page (India Domestic and International)
depends_on.effect: Field becomes visible and mandatory when Passbook Front Page option is selected

intra_panel_references.source_logic: If Please the option is chosen as Passbook Front Page (India Domestic and International)then it is visible and mandatory. The upload limit should be up to 15 Mb.

dependent_field.field_name: Please enter IFSC and Account Number manually

depends_on.condition: Please choose the option == 'Passbook Front Page (India Domestic and International)'
condition_values: Passbook Front Page (India Domestic and International)
depends_on.effect: Label becomes visible when Passbook Front Page option is selected

intra_panel_references.source_logic: Show this fields if passbook front page (India Domestic and International) is selected

depends_on.condition: Please choose the option IN ['Cancelled Cheque (India Domestic)', 'Passbook Front Page (India Domestic and International)']
condition_values: Passbook Front Page (India Domestic and International)
depends_on.effect: Visible and mandatory for Cancelled Cheque or Passbook options. Non-editable when Cancelled Cheque is selected (OCR auto-derived), editable for other options (manual entry). Invisible and non-mandatory for other process types.

intra_panel_references.source_logic: Non editable if cancelled cheque is selected. Editable for other option. Visible and mandatory for Cancelled Cheque (India Domestic) 2. Passbook Front Page (India Domestic and International). Otherwise invisible and non-mandatory. Auto-derived from OCR in case of cheque, manual entry in case of other options. Perform IFSC code verification

depends_on.condition: Please choose the option IN ['Cancelled Cheque (India Domestic)', 'Passbook Front Page (India Domestic and International)']
condition_values: Passbook Front Page (India Domestic and International)
depends_on.effect: Visible and mandatory for Cancelled Cheque or Passbook options. Non-editable when Cancelled Cheque is selected (OCR auto-derived), editable for other options (manual entry). Invisible and non-mandatory for other process types.

intra_panel_references.source_logic: Non editable if cancelled cheque is selected. Editable for other option. Visible and mandatory for Cancelled Cheque (India Domestic) 2. Passbook Front Page (India Domestic and International). Otherwise invisible and non-mandatory. Auto-derived from OCR in case of cheque, manual entry in case of other options ,Perform Bank account verification

dependent_fields.logic_source: If yes, Vendor will upload MSME Certificate and OCR will be performed post upload
If no, Vendor will upload MSME Declaration (Not Mandatory)

controlling_fields.note: Triggers MSME Validation API which auto-populates downstream fields

referenced_fields.reference_context: Exception checkbox becomes mandatory if duplicate GST is found
Exception checkbox becomes mandatory if duplicate PAN Card is found
Exception checkbox becomes mandatory if duplicate Email Id is found
Exception checkbox becomes mandatory if duplicate Mobile Number is found
Exception checkbox becomes mandatory if duplicate Bank Account Number is found

intra_panel_references.original_logic: If duplicate vendor found based on 1. Duplicate GST 2. PAN Card 3. Email Id 4. Mobile Number 5. Bank Account Number then Exception duplicate vendor creation field is mandatory 6. Business Registration Number (Applicable only for Import and International)

referenced_fields.reference_context: Justification field is semantically linked to the Exception checkbox - when exception is checked, justification would be expected
Vendor Number and Description are correlated - both represent duplicate vendor identification data
Block status relates to the duplicate vendor identified by Vendor Number

intra_panel_references.original_logic: True if duplicate, False if not duplicate

intra_panel_references.condition: If 'Is Vendor Your Customer?' = YES, then Customer Code is visible and mandatory; else hidden
intra_panel_references.extracted_from_logic: If YES, then visible and mandatory, else hidden. (Need discussion on the logic. Can we derive using a dropdown field)

dependent_fields.logic_source: If yes, Vendor will upload MSME Certificate and OCR will be performed post upload
If no, Vendor will upload MSME Declaration (Not Mandatory)

all_controlling_fields.note: Triggers MSME Validation API which auto-populates downstream fields
